fields.name: Double Heart Vertical Necklace
fields.description: Meet our Heart Necklace Collection - where we celebrate the beauty of simplicity. Double Heart Vertical Necklace. Made for everyone, it's a go-to because there's nothing it can't go with! Perfect addition to anyone's collection.

fields.name: Infinity Necklace
fields.description: Light your path with this crescent infinity necklace. Made for everyone, it's a go-to because there's nothing it can't go with! Perfect addition to anyone's collection.

fields.name: Interlace Signature Chain
fields.description: Meet our Signature Collection - where we celebrate the beauty of simplicity.Made for everyone, it's a go-to because there's nothing it can't go with! Perfect stacking chain or addition to anyone's collection.

fields.name: Moon Necklace
fields.description: Light your path with this crescent moon necklace. Inspired by its luminous presence in the night sky, this stunning 18K gold plated moon necklace serves as a reminder that there is always light, even in the face of darkness.
